title: Twitter Clone
description: Experience the features of a modern social media platform with the Twitter Clone, a fully functional application inspired by the Twitter ecosystem. Designed with an elegant interface and packed with real-time features, this clone showcases robust development practices and cutting-edge web technologies.
features: Seamless user experience with a responsive design powered by Tailwind CSS and SASS.
Real-time updates enabled by Socket.io for a dynamic social feed.
State-of-the-art authentication and user security via JWT.
Optimized performance and state management with Zustand and React Query.
